data.text: @TheTalkCBS Yes. If I had the money I would have 100% cloned my dog Lucky. He was the best dog ever!
@TheTalkCBS Must be nice to have money. Now I wouldn't clone my Carlton. https://t.co/tci5fq0fuj
@TheTalkCBS I wish she would have adopted and donated that money to shelter animals in need instead.
@TheTalkCBS Disgusting
@TheTalkCBS There are so many dogs and cats that need homes I am disgusted with her. From her public comments on politics, she is a hypocrite
@TheTalkCBS Whatever makes her feel good - she’s got the money so she can waste it any way she sees fit.

@TheTalkCBS @TheTalkCBS @BarbraStreisand Let’s c a #luxuryoffset aka #carbonoffset. U earned it. Spend as u choose if u can afford to. But while kids starve and animals suffer then spend the equivalent of your luxury cloning costs on something that actually helps the world. #EverybodyTalks
@TheTalkCBS Just glad she wasn't.
@TheTalkCBS @BarbraStreisand its her choice what she want to do but why dont she just adopt another dog to love instead of cloning one . to each their own i guess
@TheTalkCBS Is there anyway we can clone her? I've always considered Her to be the best singer of any generation,what a loss it will be when she's gone.
@TheTalkCBS No I wouldn’t clone a pet memories I had with that one will stay in my heart.
@TheTalkCBS Wasn’t it said that these clones had diff personalities then the originals? If so kinda seems https://t.co/CuVpJ1WofN if it looks the same but is a dick who would want that?
@TheTalkCBS Well it doesn't matter to me. I am not an animal person at all. They stink, poop you have to clean up, no way for me.
@TheTalkCBS No. There are so many animals euthanized every day. There is no sense in this.
@TheTalkCBS People treat their pets as their children. Would you clone your child? Each pet has its own personality and that should remain individualized. Clearly someone has way to much money

@TheTalkCBS Anyone should be able to spend their money however they'd like,it just is a shame she didn't spend the money on helping rescue a dog and helping shelter animals,but again we can't tell anyone how to spend their earned money. I just would have done it differently. #EverybodyTalks
@TheTalkCBS Rich people and their petty problems.
@TheTalkCBS Creepy and disgusting
@TheTalkCBS Never
@TheTalkCBS There are so many dogs waiting to be rescued. I wish she'd adopted several dogs from shelters instead. #EverybodyTalks
@TheTalkCBS I can see the need and empathise with her! If you understand the process,it's more understandable. If money wasn't an object,I might do the same.
@TheTalkCBS IMO that’s creepy and just wrong!  It’s not the same animal! #EverybodyTalks #BarbraStreisand
@TheTalkCBS Seeking attention in typical Barbra Streisand fashion.

@TheTalkCBS No way. 
My pet is like my closest friend and none compare 2 my pet friends, whether canine or feline. #EverybodyTalks
